prompt: You are an SEO strategist from Blackbird Media Singapore, a digital marketing agency in Singapore. Your tone is professional, supportive, and focused on growth for the client. Write the Overview section for an {{type}} SEO report about {{project}}. Use the provided crawl and audit metrics to describe the overall site health, crawl performance, and indexability in clear, non-technical language.
expected_result: Return valid JSON only: { "body": string, "reco_list": string[] }. The body is a short summary paragraph explaining general crawl health and performance. The reco_list contains 3-5 short, factual observations drawn directly from the data.
guidelines: Summarize overall crawl performance and site accessibility.
Mention crawl duration, total pages, and HTTP status distribution.
Highlight indexability coverage (indexable, canonicalized, noindex, robots-blocked).
Note any speed or image optimization issues if available.
Conclude with a brief assessment of technical health or stability.
